headline: MSTR Drops 50%+: Buy the Dip or Walk Away?
summary: MSTR shares are down over 50% as Bitcoin slides, but strong fundamentals and its BTC-heavy strategy could set Strategy up for a rebound.

headline: How did Davos turn into a tech conference?
summary: The World Economic Forum’s annual meeting in Davos felt different this year, and not just because Meta and Salesforce took over storefronts on the main promenade. AI dominated the conversation in a way that overshadowed traditional topics like climate change and global poverty, and the CEOs weren’t holding back. There was public criticism of trade policy, warnings about AI […]

headline: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff on the Rise of the “Agentic Enterprise”
summary: Marc Benioff, Salesforce co-founder and CEO, speaks with WSJ Leadership Institute President Alan Murray in Davos as AI agents begin to change the way companies operate. He says businesses may soon be “kind of running themselves.” Benioff also reflects on why this year’s Davos marks a turning point for business, technology, and geopolitics.

headline: After a 32% Reckoning In Shares, Investors Are Calling The Salesforce Bottom. It’s Time To Rally | CRM
summary: Shares of Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) are trading at $229.86, down 31% over the past year, yet retail investor sentiment has surged to a bullish 72 out of 100 on social platforms like Reddit and X. The disconnect between price action and online sentiment reflects a growing conviction that the cloud software giant’s decline has created a ... After a 32% Reckoning In Shares, Investors Are Calling The Salesforce Bottom. It’s Time To Rally | CRM

headline: Andrew Ng Thinks AI Apps are “Underinvested”—Here are the Stocks I’d Buy in Response
summary: While others see an inflating AI bubble that could burst and lose investors a boatload of money, others see underinvestment in some specific parts of the theme. Undoubtedly, it’s hard to know with any degree of certainty where the AI trade goes next, especially as other volatility drivers (think Trump tariffs) are thrown into the ... headline: 2 Bruised Tech Stocks on the Fast Track to AGI
summary: The race to achieve artificial general intelligence (AGI) is on, and the race might be closer than investors realize. Of course, it’s up for debate as to how long it’ll take for true AGI to be achieved. Some of the bigger bulls think it could happen in as little as a few years, while others ... 2 Bruised Tech Stocks on the Fast Track to AGI

headline: This Week In Cloud AI - Unlocking Unstructured Data with Rocket ContentEdge Innovation
summary: Rocket Software has unveiled Rocket® ContentEdge™, a new solution designed to unlock the value of unstructured data while ensuring safety and compliance in data modernization efforts. With features such as safety-first generative AI, automation, and seamless integration capabilities, ContentEdge enables organizations to access critical unstructured information securely across diverse environments without disrupting existing operations. This launch addresses the challenge many organizations...
